clinical_study.brief_title: Construction and Evaluation of a Stoma Patient Continuous Care Network
clinical_study.official_title: Construction and Evaluation a Network Platform of Continuous Care for Ostomy Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: Construct a professional network platformof continuous care for patients with enterostomy and evaluate its availability， Eventually, patients with enterostomy will have access to care outside the hospital.

detailed_description.textblock: The project to establish a professional care network for stomas patient will be conducted at first Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University.This network platform that patients can enjoy to make an appointment, video interrogation, the inspection booking, self management, health education, and other health and extension services;nursing staff can undertake colostomy online learning and assessment of the relevant knowledge and skills;professional colostomy care is published to provide remote guidance.the efficacy of the network was evaluated by investigating complications rate,and their self-care ability,quality of life, and medical expenses,and patients'satisfaction.

primary_outcome.description: The scale includes 20 items with a score ranging from 20 to 80points.The higher the score,the better the quality of life.

secondary_outcome.description: The scale includes 5 dimensions,30items;The higher the score,the better the Self-management.
Stoma complications include infection around the stoma,skin and mocous membrane separation, hemorrhage etal.

arm_group.description: Nurses provide web-based continuous care to patients.
Nurses provide the routine care to patients.

intervention.description: The trained nurses provide professional care for the patients.
nurses provide coventional care for the patients.
